snippet.title: Unioverse Proving Grounds - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The Unioverse Proving Grounds is a 3rd-person shooter speedrun mode and level builder. It is the first of many games set in an epic sci-fi franchise, built by top creative talent from Star Wars, Dune, Star Citizen and more. Unioverse Heroes and Game Content is accessed through our Game SDK, which can be used by any game developer to build content in the Unioverse. The Proving Grounds is an example game that will be provided to developers as a starting point to build... Whatever they want!

Top the weekly Proving Grounds leaderboard to earn digital collectibles and Proten rewards. Create custom levels, weapon skins, and more Game Content in this preview of our upcoming games and SDK.

Install here: https://launcher.elixir.app/browse/the-unioverse-proving-grounds#overview 
What's a Proen? https://www.unioverse.com/explore/how-to-earn-and-spend-protens/
